ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think this referred to Ton Twostring *rotfl*  Go fig.  Anyway - we can but hope for the best. Talies
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:52 AM 6/29/00 -1000, you wrote:
>Well I just happen to be camped out at the Grub and Grog tavern so I guess
>tonight I'll try to complete the Fabian quest. I sure hope by the time I
>log in that someone on this list or The Concert Hall can confirm if the
>quest was implemented properly. Reports from the Test server last week
>indicate it was broken on that server.
>
>What were the problems with the other two quests listed below? I wasn't
>even aware that there was a mino horn quest. Anyone got the details on it?
>And isn't Travis Twostring the bard mailman in Nek Forest? Its been so long
>since I did any of the mail delivery quests that I can't remember with 100%
>certainty exactly who Travis Twostring is.

I think this referred to Ton Twostring *rotfl* Go fig. Anyway - we can
but hope for the best.

Talies
